name: 猫不语
description:
Cats Don't Speak" is a horror mystery game with urban legend theme. The story takes place in an abandoned experimental high school, a mystery interview involved some old stories, as the investigation deepens, the school of those unknown, buried for a long time the bloody story slowly emerge, piecing together a chilling truth ......

Game screen

Old-style retro painting style, depressing horror atmosphere, heartbeat accelerates, blood pressure rises.


Game content

The work is partly based on real events in society, combined with the producer's own experience, is the first in the urban legend series.
The retribution of good and evil, like shadow, three lives of karma, the cycle is not lost.
Each decision within the game may affect the ending of the game, the game has multiple endings.
The puzzles in the game are well designed in terms of difficulty and are not too difficult to advance the game.
